title: The Mentalist S07 HDTV NL Subs DutchReleaseTeam
description:
Plot:

The Mentalist gaat over een mentalist (een artiest die het laat lijken of hij psychische krachten heeft) die na een ingrijpende gebeurtenis in zijn leven voor de politie gaat werken.
Samen met een klein team van het California Bureau of Investigation (CBI) lost hij misdaden op.


Vertaling: Rie van de Buggy's

Seizoen 7 Aflevering 1: Nothing But Blue Skies

Jane and Lisbon begin their new relationship, but they must hide their feelings for each other from their colleagues as they investigate the murder of an undercover agent. Also, young, ambitious agent Michelle Vega joins the team.

Seizoen 7 Aflevering 2: The Greybar Hotel

Lisbon goes undercover as a prison inmate in order to get a convict to turn on her boyfriend, who is the leader of a high-end car theft ring.


Seizoen 7 Aflevering 3: Orange Blossom Ice Cream

Jane and Lisbon travel to Beirut where they must work with Jane's familiar adversary Erica Flynn, who agrees to help the FBI apprehend her boyfriend, a courier for terrorist organizations, in exchange for amnesty for her past crimes.


Seizoen 7 Aflevering 4: Black Market

The team investigates a murder linked to a counterfeit diamond operation, but an illness forces Jane to direct his colleagues from the office as he recuperates. Meanwhile, Abbott is concerned that transgressions in his past could harm his wifeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s chance to obtain a prestigious job in Washington, D.C.

The team is brought in to consult on a botched DEA raid, but when AbbottÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s former boss tries to blackmail him into keeping the agencyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s missteps quiet, Abbott is forced to choose between his career and his morals.

Seizoen 7 Aflevering 7: Little Yellow House

A murder investigation becomes personal for Lisbon when she learns that her underachieving younger brother, Jimmy, is being sought as a key witness.

Seizoen 7 Aflevering 8: The Whites of His Eyes

Jane worries for LisbonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s safety when the team puts itself in the line of fire to protect the witness in a murder investigation from a skilled assassin.

Seizoen 7 Aflevering 10: Nothing Gold Can Stay

Jane takes extreme measures as the team tries to apprehend a deadly gang of armored car robbers before their desperation to remain free costs more innocent people their lives.


Seizoen 7 Aflevering 11: Byzantium

A young man claiming to have psychic powers offers his help to the FBI in solving a pair of murders, but when he leads them to additional victims, Jane and the team begin to suspect that he is in fact the killer theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re hunting.


Seizoen 7 Aflevering 12: Brown Shag Carpet

Jane agrees to once again pretend to be a renowned psychic and be used as bait in an attempt to lure out a serial killer and give the FBI a chance to apprehend him.

Seizoen 7 Aflevering 13: White Orchids
